name: GetTaxesPage
description:
Retrieve a page of tax details from HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to read a specific page of tax details from the HubSpot CRM. You can control which properties are returned by specifying them in the query parameters.

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of tax results to display per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: paging_cursor_token
parameters.description: The token for the paging cursor from the last read resource for fetching the next page of results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: included_properties
parameters.description: List the properties to be returned for each tax. Specify as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: properties_with_history
parameters.description: Specify properties to return with their history. Reduces max number of taxes per request.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored. Usage of this parameter will reduce the maximum number of taxes that can be read by a single request.

parameters.name: retrieve_associated_object_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. Non-existent associations will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: archived_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived tax results.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: propertiesWithHistory
parameters.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored. Usage of this parameter will reduce the maximum number of taxes that can be read by a single request.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored. Usage of this parameter will reduce the maximum number of taxes that can be read by a single request.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
